description.narrative: PROGRAMME CONJOINT DES NATIONS UNIES POUR LE RENFORCEMENT DE LA RESILIENCE DES ADOLESCENTS ET JEUNES EN CENTRAFRIQUE

Le programme conjoint vise à contribuer à la reconstruction du capital humain orientée vers les jeunes, pour assurer la transformation économique de la RCA ainsi que le renforcement de la paix, la sécurité et la cohésion sociale.

title.narrative: Support to stabilisation and socio-economic recovery

description.narrative: Support to stabilisation, socio-economic recovery and prevention of radicalization of vulnerable populations through access to employment and social services in conflict-affected communities

Populations and communities in Bangui, Bossangoa and Bambari affected by the conflict become less resilient to outside and inside shocks and outbreaks of violence. social cohesion fabric, community security and livelihood means needs support.
